portfolio.title: NBA MVP Predictor
portfolio.description: I utilized Machine Learning to predict the past, current, and future NBA MVPs. I web scraped player statistics and loaded the data into pandas for analysis. I identified trends and patterns in historical MVP data from 2003 to 2023 and used this information to employ machine learning algorithms to build predictive models like random forest and regression models. In the end, the final model achieved an 81% prediction rate, demonstrating its effectiveness in forecasting NBA MVPs.
portfolio.skills: Skills Utilized: Python | Scikit-learn | Web Scraping | BeautifulSoup | Selenium | Pandas

portfolio.title: AI Doctor Chatbot
portfolio.description: Developed and designed a chatbot application that serves as a doctor that users can consult to address any health/medical concerns. Used Python/Django for backend functionality and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for frontend development to craft a seamless and visually appealing user interface for the chatbot. Implemented a signup and login page for user authentication for the application, as well as the ability to access past conversations that correspond to the specific user. Implemented OpenAI API to harness advanced natural language processing capabilities for effective communication and understanding of user queries. Leveraged fine-tuning techniques on the OpenAI API to train the chatbot to develop accurate diagnosis and treatment plans while strictly answering health-related questions only.
portfolio.skills: Skills Utilized: Python | Django | OpenAI API | HTML | CSS | JS
